markdownRemark.html:
Featured.

Teste deine Joomla-Komponente

  1. Installiere am Ende deine Komponente in Joomla! Version 4, um sie zu testen:

Kopiere die Dateien im administrator Ordner in den administrator Ordner deiner Joomla! 4 Installation.
Kopiere die Dateien im components Ordner in den components Ordner deiner Joomla! 4 Installation.
Kopiere die Dateien im media Ordner in den media Ordner deiner Joomla! 4 Installation.

2.

Geänderte Dateien

168
+ {
169
+ $orderCol = 'ordering';
170
+ }
171
+
172
+ $this->setState('list.ordering', $orderCol);
173
+
174
+ $listOrder = $app->input->get('filter_order_Dir', 'ASC');
175
+
176
+ if (!in_array(strtoupper($listOrder), array('ASC', 'DESC', '')))
177
+ {
178
+ $listOrder = 'ASC';
179
+ }
180
+
181
+ $this->setState('list.direction', $listOrder);
182
+
183
+ $user = Factory::getUser();
184
+
185
+ if ((!$user->authorise('core.edit.state', 'com_foos')) && (!$user->authorise('core.edit', 'com_foos')))
186
+ {
187
+ // Limit to published for people who can't edit or edit.state.
188
+ $this->setState('filter.published', 1);
189
+
190
+ // Filter by start and end dates.
191
+ $this->setState('filter.publish_date', true);
192
+ }
193
+
194
+ $this->setState('filter.language', Multilanguage::isEnabled());
195
+
196
+ // Load the parameters.
197
+ $this->setState('params', $params);
198
+ }
199
+ }

+ <?php
2
+ /**
3

8
+ */
9
+
10
+ namespace Joomla\Component\Foos\Site\View\Featured;
11
+
12
+ defined('_JEXEC') or die;
13
+
14
+ use Joomla\CMS\Factory;
15
+ use Joomla\CMS\HTML\HTMLHelper;
16
+ use Joomla\CMS\Language\Text;
17
+ use Joomla\CMS\Mail\MailHelper;
18
+ use Joomla\CMS\MVC\View\GenericDataException;
19
+ use Joomla\CMS\MVC\View\HtmlView as BaseHtmlView;
20
+
21
+ /**
22
+ * Featured View class
23
+ *
24
+ * @since __BUMP_VERSION__
25
+ */
26
+ class HtmlView extends BaseHtmlView
27
+ {
28
+ /**
29
+ * The item model state
30
+ *
31
+ * @var \Joomla\Registry\Registry
32
+ * @since __BUMP_VERSION__
33
+ */
34
+ protected $state;
35
+
36
+ /**
37
+ * The item details
38
+ *
39
+ * @var \JObject
40
+ * @since __BUMP_VERSION__
41
+ */
42
+ protected $items;
43
+
44
+ /**
45
+ * The pagination object
46
+ *
47
+ * @var \JPagination
48
+ * @since __BUMP_VERSION__
49
+ */
50
+ protected $pagination;
51
+
52
+ /**
53
+ * The page parameters
54
+ *
55
+ * @var \Joomla\Registry\Registry|null
56
+ * @since __BUMP_VERSION__
57
+ */
58
+ protected $params = null;
59
+
60
+ /**
61
+ * The page class suffix
62
+ *
63
+ * @var string
64
+ * @since __BUMP_VERSION__
65
+ */
66
+ protected $pageclass_sfx = '';
67
+
68
+ /**
69
+ * Method to display the view.
70
+ *
71
+ * @param string $tpl The name of the template file to parse; automatically searches through the template paths.
72
+ *
73
+ * @return mixed \Exception on failure, void on success.
74
+ *
75
+ * @since __BUMP_VERSION__
76
+ */
77
+ public function display($tpl = null)
78
+ {
79
+ $app = Factory::getApplication();
80
+ $params = $app->getParams();
81
+
82
+ // Get some data from the models
83
+ $state = $this->get('State');
84
+ $items = $this->get('Items');
85
+ $category = $this->get('Category');
86
+ $children = $this->get('Children');
87
+ $parent = $this->get('Parent');
88
+ $pagination = $this->get('Pagination');
89
+
90
+ // Flag indicates to not add limitstart=0 to URL
91
+ $pagination->hideEmptyLimitstart = true;
92
+
93
+ // Check for errors.
94
+ if (count($errors = $this->get('Errors')))
95
+ {
96
+ throw new GenericDataException(implode("\n", $errors), 500);
97
+ }
98
+
99
+ // Prepare the data.
100
+ // Compute the foos slug.
101
+ for ($i = 0, $n = count($items); $i < $n; $i++)
102
+ {
103
+ $item = &$items[$i];
104
+ $item->slug = $item->alias ? ($item->id . ':' . $item->alias) : $item->id;
105
+ $temp = $item->params;
106
+ $item->params = clone $params;
107
+ $item->params->merge($temp);
108
+
109
+ if ($item->params->get('show_email', 0) == 1)
110
+ {
111
+ $item->email_to = trim($item->email_to);
112
+
113
+ if (!empty($item->email_to) && MailHelper::isEmailAddress($item->email_to))
114
+ {
115
+ $item->email_to = HTMLHelper::_('email.cloak', $item->email_to);
116
+ }
117
+ else
118
+ {
119
+ $item->email_to = '';
120
+ }
121
+ }
122
+ }
123
+
124
+ // Escape strings for HTML output
125
+ $this->pageclass_sfx = htmlspecialchars($params->get('pageclass_sfx'), ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8');
126
+
127
+ $maxLevel = $params->get('maxLevel', -1);
128
+ $this->maxLevel = &$maxLevel;
129
+ $this->state = &$state;
130
+ $this->items = &$items;
131
+ $this->category = &$category;
132
+ $this->children = &$children;
133
+ $this->params = &$params;
134
+ $this->parent = &$parent;
135
+ $this->pagination = &$pagination;
136
+
137
+ $this->_prepareDocument();
138
+
139
+ return parent::display($tpl);
140
+ }
141
+
142
+ /**
143
+ * Prepares the document
144
+ *
145
+ * @return void
146
+ *
147
+ * @since __BUMP_VERSION__
148
+ */
149
+ protected function _prepareDocument()
150
+ {
151
+ $app = Factory::getApplication();
152
+ $menus = $app->getMenu();
153
+ $title = null;
154
+
155
+ // Because the application sets a default page title,
156
+ // we need to get it from the menu item itself
157
+ $menu = $menus->getActive();
158
+
159
+ if ($menu)
160
+ {
161
+ $this->params->def('page_heading', $this->params->get('page_title', $menu->title));
162
+ }
163
+ else
164
+ {
165
+ $this->params->def('page_heading', Text::_('COM_FOOS_DEFAULT_PAGE_TITLE'));
166
+ }
167
+
168
+ $title = $this->params->get('page_title', '');
169
+
170
+ if (empty($title))
171
+ {
172
+ $title = $app->get('sitename');
173
+ }
174
+ elseif ($app->get('sitename_pagetitles', 0) == 1)
175
+ {
176
+ $title = Text::sprintf('JPAGETITLE', $app->get('sitename'), $title);
177
+ }
178
+ elseif ($app->get('sitename_pagetitles', 0) == 2)
179
+ {
180
+ $title = Text::sprintf('JPAGETITLE', $title, $app->get('sitename'));
181
+ }
182
+
183
+ $this->document->setTitle($title);
184
+
185
+ if ($this->params->get('menu-meta_description'))
186
+ {
187
+ $this->document->setDescription($this->params->get('menu-meta_description'));
188
+ }
189
+
190
+ if ($this->params->get('menu-meta_keywords'))
191
+ {
192
+ $this->document->setMetaData('keywords', $this->params->get('menu-meta_keywords'));
193
+ }
194
+
195
+ if ($this->params->get('robots'))
196
+ {
197
+ $this->document->setMetaData('robots', $this->params->get('robots'));
198
+ }
199
+ }
200
+ }
